bedrockoid.midnightconfig.title: Bedrockoid Configuration
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.armorStandArms: Have arms of armor stand to be visible by default
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.redstoneConnec: Can be redstone connected to piston
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.snowlogging: Can be plants covered by snow
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.blocksWaterlog: Have some missed blocks to be waterlogged if placed in water
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.cauldronNatura: Can cauldron be filled by liquid naturally
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.stopElytraByPr: Can be fly with elytra stopped by pressing jump button
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.wetSpongesDryO: Can be wet sponges dried out in dry biomes
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.entitySharesFi: Can entities in fire light campfires and candles
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.fallenTrees: Have fallen trees to be spawned
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.reachAroundPla: Can Bedrock Edition reach around placement be used
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.sheepFurColorF: Have sheep's fur color to be fixed
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.mushroomTreesI: Can be mushroom trees spawn in swamp
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.canPlantsBeBon: Can plants be duped by bonemealing
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.shieldActivate: Can shield be activated if sneaking
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.fireAspectImpr: Can item with fire aspect fire tnt, campfires and candles
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.composterColli: Have composter's collision to be fixed after composting
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.snowSpawnsUnde: Have snow to be spawned under trees
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.disableSnowUnd: List of biomes, where snow blocked to spawned under trees
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.snowCoversLeav: Can leaves be painted in white if snow above them or biome is snowy
bedrockoid.midnightconfig.snowCoversVine: Can vines be painted in white if snow above them or biome is snowy
